name: Deep Space (itch) (semruk)
description:
Radiation, Gravity and Time will be your invisible enemies !

Loot sources for your planet and bring them back! If you can...

Developed for QUARANTINE JAM, in 3 days...

-----------------------------------------------------------------

In this game we aimed 3 different things as hidden enemy. Gravity , Radiation and Time will be your enemies !

As a space adventurer you have to save your homeworld. In your homeworld people use resources to survive but it decreases every second. Get your suit and launch your spaceship !
Explore the galaxy and ride your spaceship to other planets. Gather the resources and turn back to your home. But dont forget to STAY ALIVE !

* There are 25 different planets!
* Each of them will be randomized when you start a new game!

Do not forget to check planet stats before land it! Planets can be very dangerous!

-----------------------------------------------------------------

? ? HOW TO PLAY ? ?

*** | A - D |     movements
*** | Space |     JetPack! Weeeee
*** | F |         Interact with objects

Press and Hold Space for SpaceShip Boost! This boost will widen your view too!
If you want to land a planet... You can figure it out =D

Don't touch the thorns!
Leave the planet before the protection time is over! (Check planet stats before land it!!!)

Gather sources from other planets and bring them to your homeland. That's all...
